column5:
Bosch ALR 900 Lawn Raker

Your lawn will only flourish if you regulary free it from moss and leaves.  you can remove both of these using the Bosch Lawn Raker by setting its 20 spring steel tines to the corresponding height from -5mm to gently comb out the thatch out damaging the grass to +10mm to collect leaves.  The patented "Jet-Collect" System creates an airflow to blast everything into the collection box, therefore preventing annoying blockages.

 Features:

  • Compact storage - Double folding handle, stackable collection box
  • Large 50-Litre collection box - means less stopping and time to empty it
  • "Jet-Collect" System - Innovative drum with spring steel tines and airflow inlets quickly and completely removes thatch and moss

Specification:

  • Motor Power - 900W
  • Drum System - 10 double steel tines
  • "Jet-Collection" System
  • Working width - 32cm
  • Working Height - +10/+5/0/-5mm
  • Working height settings - 4
  • Collection Box capacity - 50 litres
  • Weight - 9.4kg
column10: Outdoor Power Tools / Scarifiers

column5:
Bosch AXT 25 TC Quiet Shredder

Ideal for all types of wood and green material.

Do you want to shread your garden waste without having to separate green material from wood?  Bosch has a quiet shredder with "Turbine-Cut" System for all types of wood and green material.  You also get your work finished more quickly due to the patented fast feed hopper and automatic feed for fast material throughput.  And the removable hopper fits exactly in the collection box to ensure space-saving storage.

Features:

  • Automatic feed and low noise levels - for extremely convenient shredding
  • Cutting capacity - of up to 45mm for powerful shredding
  • Practical collection box - 53-litre capacity for easier collection of the shredded material
  • Patented, removable hopper - for easy filling and safe release of blockages
  • Shielded cutting mechanism - for greater user safety
  • "Turbine-Cut" System - Innovative cutting system with motor power of 2500 Watts
  • Patented safety function of the collection box - the tool only works when the collection box is in position

Specification:

  • Cutting System - Turbine-cut
  • Motor Power - 2500W
  • Cutting capacity - 45mm diameter
  • Material throughput rate - approx. 230kg/h
  • Cutting Speed - 41rpm
  • Torque - approx 650Nm
  • LWA Noise Emission Level - approx 89bd (A)
  • Voltage - 230V
  • Weight - 30.5kg
  • Automatic Feed
  • Collection Box - 53 Litres

Makita Petrol Disc cutter 305mm (12")  EK6100 is equipped with 61cm³ 2-stroke engine with stratified scavenging system.

Makita has updated the DPC6430 12" stone cutting saw and this machine is a worthy rival to the Stihl TS410.

The new model has the following advantages:

  • Lightweight 1.2kg (2.6lbs) lighter than DPC6430
  • Enhanced air filtration cyclone pre-separation system effectively removes dust particles away from intake air and reduces dust stuck on the filter.

Includes:

  • Tool Kit
  • Dust suppression kit

Features:

  • Rapid start pull force required to start the machine is drastically reduced with spring-assisted recoil starter.
  • Touch and Stop Switch
  • Fuel primer for easy starting.
  • High quality driving belt does not require tensioning once the proper tension is adjusted.
  • Enhanced Air Filtration
  • Developed in compliance with all known exhaust emission regulations
  • Lightweight 1.2kg (2.6lbs) lighter than DPC6430
  • Water supply with intake filter and fine adjustment for adequate dust protection.

column4: Makita GA9020S 230mm Angle Grinder with Soft Start (9inch)
column5:
Makita GA9020 230mm Angle Grinder with Soft Start (9inch)

The updated replacement to the hugely popular 9069 grinder from Makita.

The Makita GA9020 single speed 230mm 2000w angle grinder has been adopted by the construction industry, when fitted with a diamond blade the Makita GA9020 will cut anything from roof tiles to paving slabs, fitted with a superior anti dust structure device to protect the armature and weighing a mere 5.8kg,

A lighter option to a petrol cutter which can be heavy and cumbersome and difficult to start. The Makita GA9020 is fitted with a 2 stage on/off switch which requires the user to push the switch forward then pull up and a soft grip rear handle for user comfort and added grip. The front side handle has 3 positions, either side of the gear box for user comfort, or on the top of the gear box which is a position favoured for cutting.

Features:

  • Latest model Makita 9inch angle grinder
  • Spindle Lock for fast and easy disc change
  • Double Insulated
  • Soft Start
  • Available in 110V & 240V

Specification:

  • Wheel Size: 230mm
  • Bore Size: 22mm
  • Spindle size: M14 x 2mm
  • Wire Cup Brush: 110mm
  • No Load Speed 6,600rpm
  • Input Wattage 2,000W
  • Net Weight 4.7kg

Includes:

  • Lock Nut Wrench
  • Side Handle
  • Wheel Guard

column5:
Bosch GEX 150AC Random Orbit Sander

The random orbit motion plus rotation ensures the finest sanding with high sanding performance. With aluminium bearing flange for long service life and high running smoothness, control Electronic and speed preselection, i.e. the right speed for every application and even the sanding plate brake prevents damage (scoring) on workpiece! Bosch's very own Micro-filter System means perfect mobile extraction. With velcro-type fastening for rapid, convenient sanding sheet changes. Best for sanding and polishing wood, metal and plastic, paint and varnish, even on curved surfaces. Also suitable for left-handers!

Specification:

  • Power Input - 340W
  • No Load Orbit Rate - 4500-12000/min
  • Base Plate Size - 150mm Dia.
  • Weight - 2.1kg

The Makita HW101 Compact Power Washer is ideal for domestic use on driveways or patios.

The lance features an adjustable nozzle for accurate cleaning and there is an adjustable detergent bottle that allows you to apply solutions depending on the job.

It has a universal electric motor with wobble plate pump and an aluminium pump head. Features a Total Stop System (TSS) which switches the motor on and off when the lance trigger is operated, prolonging the motor life. The stainless steel pistons provide increased working life and more reliability.

Specification:

  • Max pressure: 100 bar
  • Max flow: 360 L/hr
  • Input wattage: 1.3kw
  • Motor type: induction
  • Pump: Triplex with wobble plate
  • Net Weight: 6.5kg

Comes with:

  • 3meter HP hose
  • Gun and lance (Fan head)
  • Detergent bottle

column5:
The Bosch Rotak 37 Electric Rotary Lawnmower has been discontinued by Bosch. Bosch are suggesting the Rotak 37 as an alternative until their new model is launched later in 2015.

Bosch Rotak 37 Electric Rotary Lawnmower helps maintain a neat and tidy lawn with this 1400W corded Bosch Rotak 37 rotary lawnmower

The Rotak 37 lawnmower is ideal for medium sized lawns.

Bosch Rotak 37 Lawnmower features:

  • 1400 watt electric rotary motor.
  • Steel blade.
  • 37cm blade width.
  • 5 cutting heights.
  • Cutting heights ranging from 2cm-7cm.
  • 40 litre grass collection box.
  • Single level height of cut adjustment, easily adjusted to suit different lawn conditions.
  • 10m power cable.
  • Safety switch.
  • Rear roller.
  • Weight 11.2kg.
column10: Outdoor Power Tools / Lawn Mowers

column4: Bosch Rotak 43 Ergoflex Electric Rotary Lawnmower
column5:
Bosch Rotak 43 Electric Rotary Lawnmower

Are you looking for a lawn mower that can easily cut long grass and every single blade along the edge?  Then the Rotak is the right mower for you.  With in-set front wheels, its innovative grass combs enables cutting of grass close to the edge due to their special design.  Its Powerdrive motor has enormous power reserves, enabling it to tackle long grass with extremely high cutting strength. It therefore makes it easy for you to mow the lawn on returning from your summer holidays.

Features:

  • High Torque motor - ensures a reliable cut, even under difficult conditions
  • Large 50-litre collection box - means less stopping and time to empty it
  • Innovative grass combs - cut close to the edge of walls, flower beds and lawns
  • Light Weight - considerably lighter than conventional lawnmowers
  • Easy to transport - with convenient carrying handles
  • Ergoflex version

Specification:

  • Motor Power - 1700w
  • Torque - 23Nm
  • Width of cut - 43cm
  • Bosch Powerdrive motor
  • Cutting system - rotary blades
  • Grass combs
  • Weight - 12.3kg
  • Grass box capacity - 50 litres
  • Height of cut - 20-70mm
  • Height of cut settings - 10, central
  • Type of switch - Full width on/off switch
  • Intergrated carrying handle
  • Motor Overload cut-out
column10: Outdoor Power Tools / Lawn Mowers

column4: Black and Decker STC1815 Cordless Strimmer 18 Volt 1 x 1.5Ah Li-Ion
column5:
Black & Decker 18v Li-On String Trimmer 1.5Ah

Black & Decker STC1815 18V Strimmer is ideal for trimming, edging, and mowing. Powered by E-Drive Technology, that is a high torque gear system powers through even the toughest overgrown areas quickly without clogging. The Click and Go system means you can go from striming to mowing in seconds, as the String Trimmer simply clicks into the base, enabling easy change from trimming to mowing and back.

It offers cordless convenience, by using Lithium battery technology for long lasting fade free power, without the hassle of a cord. Uses AFS® or Automatic single line feed system, that saves you time and effort. Offers fast cutting, with a 25cm cutting swathe for fast job completion over large areas.

Compatible with the CM100 wheeled base for more controlled, comfortable cutting over larger areas.

Supplied with 1 x 18 Volt 1.5Ah Li-Ion Battery.

Specification

Input Power: 18 Volt.
Cutting Swath: 28cm.
Line Cutting Speed: 6,200/min.
Line Feed System: AFS single.
Charge time: 3.75 hours.
NL Runtime: 44 mins.
Line Diameter: 1.6mm.
Area of Cut: 1850m.
Weight: 4.8kg.
column10: Outdoor Power Tools / Line and Edge Trimmers
